Given some context, edit a movie review
The movie was enjoyable but the plot was too predictable.

Context: I watched a movie called “The Pied Piper” last week.

Last week, I watched a movie called "The Pied Piper." While I found the movie enjoyable overall, I felt that the plot was a bit too predictable. The film had its moments of charm and intrigue, but it often followed a formulaic storyline that made it easy to anticipate the next turn. Despite this, the performances were engaging, and the visual elements were captivating enough to keep me entertained throughout.
